title: I accidentally ate a piece of plastic..will anything happen to me?
body: If you think stepping on them hurts, well you're in for a treat. That's a drop in the bucket compared to all the plastic you ingest over the course of a day. The plastic content will not harm you. At worst, it might scrape against your insides, but even that's fairly unlikely. How big? You'll probably just poop it out.
readable_content:
D4rKm4rv1n (2022-08-16): You are going to shit Lego's for a week. If you think stepping on them hurts, well you're in for a treat.

MobileSignificance57 (2022-08-16): That's a drop in the bucket compared to all the plastic you ingest over the course of a day. The plastic content will not harm you. At worst, it might scrape against your insides, but even that's fairly unlikely.

Comfortable_Host_736 (2022-08-16): How big? You'll probably just poop it out.

PrestigiousPitch8849 (2022-08-16): It was 1 of the 4 „teeth“ of the fork, so I suppose 3 cm long and 0.5 cm wide?

- aaronite (2022-08-16): You'll poop it out.

- [deleted] (2022-08-16)

notextinctyet (2022-08-16): It depends on the size and shape and sharpness of the piece of plastic. Usually, it passes and nothing bad happens. Large and/or sharp pieces can sometimes cause problems.
summary: The conversation seems to downplay the potential harm of ingesting plastic, with some users suggesting that it will likely pass without causing any harm. There is also some lighthearted humor about the situation. Overall, the tone is relaxed and not particularly concerned about the potential risks of ingesting plastic. Sentiment: -0.3
